text:
21H2 ended updates in June unless they’re on Enterprise/Edu. 
Instead of debugging tough WU problems I find it far easier to just upgrade to
the next version which replaces all the WU files during the install. 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.
%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com
